```{r knitr-opts, include = FALSE}
DOCNAME = "combine"
knitr::opts_chunk$set(autodep        = TRUE,
                      cache          = FALSE,
                      cache.path     = paste0("cache/", DOCNAME, "/"),
                      cache.comments = TRUE,
                      echo           = FALSE,
                      error          = FALSE,
                      fig.align      = "center",
                      fig.path       = paste0("figures/", DOCNAME, "/"),
                      fig.width      = 10,
                      fig.height     = 8,
                      dev            = c('svg', 'png'),
                      message        = FALSE,
                      warning        = FALSE)
```

```{r load-libraries, echo = FALSE}
library("knitr")
```
